product_name: K2 Slope Style Ski Poles - Women's
long_description: The K2 Slope Style Ski poles feature a full-length composite construction that's lightweight and durable. Hit the slopes with these performance-driven poles and conquer the mountain. Composite fiberglass construction aligns all fibers in shaft for optimal strength and durability. Dual-durometer grips feature a reduced diameter for a comfortable fit in small hands. Small baskets work well in most snow conditions, especially hardpack. The K2 Slope Style ski poles feature adjustable wrist straps.
